response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire the product at a discount. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 14000}
